X-Request-Id.description: Response header returned by all operations. Identifies the server-side request id of the call.

get.description: Get all items of an anonymous wishlist.

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: The id of the organization.

parameters.name: listGuid
parameters.description: The globally unique guid of the wishlist.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: List of item ids to use as a filter for the returned list. The filter must not contain more than 100 ids.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results is 0.

X-Request-Id.description: Response header returned by all operations. Identifies the server-side request id of the call.

400.description: Any of the parameters are invalid/malformed.

parameters.description: List of item ids to use as a filter for the returned list. The filter must not contain more than 100 ids.

item.description: The representation of an item on a wishlist.
item.title: item

id.description: The unique identifier of the item. Maximum 18 characters.

key.description: The account-unique (private) key of the wishlist. Maximum 18 characters.

guid.description: The globally unique public guid of the wishlist.

size.description: The number of items on the list.

name.description: The (human readable) name of the wishlist.
name.example: Donald's great list. It's amazing. Really.

wishlist_form.description: The form to update the name of a wishlist.
wishlist_form.title: wishlist_form

name.description: The (human readable) name of the wishlist.
name.example: Donald's great list. It's amazing. Really.
